hypervisorManager

Class HypervisorFactory

  • java.lang.Object
    • hypervisorManager.HypervisorFactory

  • public class HypervisorFactory
extends java.lang.Object
    Factory responsible for managing hypervisor classes and instances. This class provides methods to dynamically load hypervisor classes and instantiate them.
    Author:
    Clouder, CesarF

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static java.util.List<java.lang.String> getCurrentExecutions()
      Returns the list of currents executions in each hypervisors
      static Hypervisor getHypervisor(java.lang.String hypervisorId)
      Uses the map to search for hypervisor instances, if there is not an entry for the given name then it is loaded dinamically using java´s reflection API.
      static void registerHypervisors() 

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        equals, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Method Detail

      • registerHypervisors

        public static void registerHypervisors()

      • getHypervisor

        public static Hypervisor getHypervisor(java.lang.String hypervisorId)
        Uses the map to search for hypervisor instances, if there is not an entry for the given name then it is loaded dinamically using java´s reflection API. If there is an associated object, then a new instance is returned by using the method getInstance from Hypervisor abstract class.
        Parameters:
        hypervisorId - The hypervisor id to be instantiated
        Returns:
        A managed hypervisor for the given name

      • getCurrentExecutions

        public static java.util.List<java.lang.String> getCurrentExecutions()
        Returns the list of currents executions in each hypervisors
        Returns:
        list of current executions in hypervisors
